column2: ENGLISH

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Staying idle is not in a warrior's blood, I hence invite you to aid me against my enemies. I promise to put in a good word you at the lodge based on your participation in the war. [GetWarLetterFlavor]

With the hope of your support,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I am reaching out to you, asking if you wish to join the war against [warrior_lodge_war_defender.GetTitledFirstName]. I promise to put in a good word you at the lodge if I win the war. [GetWarLetterFlavor]

With the hope of your support,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I heard that you turned down the offer made from [warrior_lodge_war_defender.GetTitledFirstName]. My counter offer is similar, I will put in a good word you at the lodge with the possibility of something additional if my victory is ensured. 

With the hope of your support,
[From.GetTitledName]

The war that raged between [warrior_lodge_war_attacker.GetTitledFirstName] and [warrior_lodge_war_defender.GetTitledFirstName] has now ended in favor of [warrior_lodge_war_victor.GetFirstName]. [GetWarLetterOutcome]

The war that raged between [warrior_lodge_war_attacker.GetTitledFirstName] and [warrior_lodge_war_defender.GetTitledFirstName] has now ended in favor of [warrior_lodge_war_victor.GetFirstName]. [GetWarLetterOutcome]
The war that raged between [warrior_lodge_war_attacker.GetTitledFirstName] and [warrior_lodge_war_defender.GetTitledFirstName] has now come to a sizzling ending in white peace. [GetWarLetterOutcome]

Another letter from [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetFirstName] arrived today. [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetSheHeCap] shares the news of people's reactions after he regaled them the grand tales of my deeds. Along with the stories is also an invitation to join [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetHerHim] in [GetSuggestedActivity]...

I can tell by the handwriting that another letter from [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetFirstName] has arrived on my desk. After I accepted [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetHerHis] invitation to celebrate [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetHerHis] victory, [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetSheHe] has written more often. Surely there's a reason for this continued contact?
I gladly accept. May my weapon taste the blood of your enemies!
I am pleased to hear this.
I happily accept! What a joyous occasion to share with [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetFirstName].
Time spent [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetFirstName] are precious memories I will forever cherish.
I have other matters to attend to.
Is that all? I expected more...
Decline the invitation. It is not suitable to my taste.
I never thought that I could find love as a consequence of war...
The nerve of this brazen fool!
My letters to [warrior_lodge_war_side.GetFirstName] is nothing but formality.
What should I have done differently...?
There is truth in his harsh words. I must abandon my craven ways.
